summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5779 for the improvement of West Dravus Street, from 29th Avenue West to 30th Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76210 as amended by Ordinances No. 76834 and 77384, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
